actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize establishment of the William Jennings Bryan Birthplace National Historic Site, Salem, Ill., and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the establishment of the William Jennings Bryan Birthplace National Historic Site, Salem, Illinois. Authorizes the appropriation of such sums as are necessary to carry out this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize establishment of the William Jennings Bryan Birthplace National Historic Site, Salem, Ill., and for other purposes.
